course_description:
Advanced Neuroethics explores 2 special themes in Neuroethics. One from Ethics of
Neuroscience and Neuroscience of Ethics. Approaching from different disciplinary
perspectives, students in this discussion seminar read primary literature & popular media to produce short analysis and position papers.
prerequisites: NBB 280 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2366, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: G. Hue, Status: Closed
